CustomField.description: Additional Disc per Unit, Additional Disc divided by Term, Qty (and Billable Days for ES)
CustomField.formula:
IF ( SBQQ__AdditionalDiscount__c = 0, NULL,
SBQQ__AdditionalDiscount__c / Subscription_Term_Quote__c / SBQQ__Quantity__c / IF ( SBQQ__Quote__r.Region__c = "ES Canada" , SBQQ__Quote__r.Days_in_Month__c , IF ( SBQQ__Quote__r.Region__c = "ES US" , SBQQ__Quote__r.Days_in_Month__c ,
1)))
CustomField.label: Unit Disc
